pages.title: Husbandry mechanic soul
pages.text: After consuming 3 chickens, 3 cows, 3 sheeps and 1 horse, weak mechanic soul was transformed to husbandry mechanic soul!$(p)In addition to be more powerful weak mechanic soul variant, seems, this soul also provide abilities to interact with animals!
In additions to weak mechanic soul abilities, this soul also allow to interact with animals and even transfer them inside!$(p)But be aware, any stored animal will be lost after turtle is broken.
